quest.name: Wool's Errand
journal: Anaoc seeks an adventurer to assist the Red Rooster Stead.
Anaoc asks you to deliver wool to the Grey Fleet. Retrieve the sack of fleece from the sheep's pen.
You have obtained the sack of fleece. Deliver it to Weitzaren at the Grey Fleet.
Weitzaren receives your delivery with equal parts exasperation and delight. Thanks to you, the miller may now begin making his felt.
objectives: Deliver the sack of fleece to Weitzaren at the Grey Fleet.

dialogue.name: ANAOC
dialogue.text: I hope you don't feel sheepish about hauling a wee bit of wool. The flock's fleece is shorn and scoured, and the sack is all set to sail.

dialogue.name: ANAOC
dialogue.text: Normally, the manic miller up north takes it and felts it for us.

dialogue.name: ANAOC
dialogue.text: But it seems the only wool his courier's tending to today is his blanket, the lackadaisical loafer.

dialogue.name: ANAOC
dialogue.text: So, I hoped you might see to it the sack of fleece down by the flock's pen reaches the millerâ”€Weitzaren is his name.

dialogue.name: WEITZAREN
dialogue.text: A miller with no fleece is an artist with no canvas! A poet with no words! A man with no purpose!

dialogue.name: WEITZAREN
dialogue.text: Curse that blasted courier! Do the sheep stop growing? Does the mill stop churning? What entitles him to rest?

dialogue.name: WEITZAREN
dialogue.text: Bah! Let him count sheep in his bed! The wool is at last mine, and soon the felt shall be wrought! Mwahahaha...
